{{also|mutter|mütter|Mütter}} ==German== ===Etymology 1=== From {{inh|de|gmh|muoter}}, {{m|gmh|mūter}}, {{m|gmh|mōter}}, from {{inh|de|goh|muoter}}, from {{inh|de|gem-pro|*mōdēr}}, from {{inh|de|ine-pro|*méh₂tēr}}. Compare {{cog|nl|moeder}}, {{cog|en|mother}}, {{cog|da|moder}}, {{cog|sv|moder}} ====Alternative forms==== * {{alter|de|Muetter|Mueter}} {{qualifier|obsolete or dialectal}} ====Pronunciation==== * {{IPA|de|/ˈmʊtɐ/|[ˈmʊtʰɐ]}} * {{audio|de|De-Mutter.ogg|audio}} ====Noun==== {{de-noun|f||Mütter|Mütterchen|dim2=Mütterlein}} # [[mother]] =====Usage notes===== * The substantive ''Mutter'' can also decline like a proper noun and can take the ending ''-s'' in the genitive singular, e.g. ''Mutters Geburtstag''. * In the dative singular, the ending ''-n'' is sometimes added, e.g. {{m|de|wie bei Muttern}}. =====Declension===== {{de-decl-noun-f|pl=Mütter}} =====Antonyms===== * {{l|de|Vater|g=m}} * {{l|de|Kind|g=n}} ====Hypernyms==== * {{l|de|Eltern}} * {{l|de|Frau}} =====Derived terms===== * {{l|de|Mutterbrust}} * {{l|de|Mutterkuchen}} * {{l|de|Mutterliebe}} * {{l|de|mutterlos}} * {{l|de|Muttermilch}} * {{l|de|Muttersöhnchen}} * {{l|de|Mutterschaft}} * {{l|de|Muttersprache}} * {{l|de|Rabenmutter}} * {{l|de|werdende Mutter}} =====Descendants===== * {{desc|bor=1|gmw-cfr|Motter}} ===Etymology 2=== Originally the same as etymology 1, but secondarily distinguished in the plural; so denoted by a sexual metaphor, which is also found in other languages. Compare for example {{cog|nl|moer}}. ====Pronunciation==== * {{IPA|de|/ˈmʊtɐ/|[ˈmʊtɐ]}} * {{audio|de|De-Mutter.ogg|audio}} ====Noun==== {{de-noun|f||Muttern}} # [[nut]] {{qualifier|for a bolt}} =====Synonyms===== * {{l|de|Schraubenmutter}} {{topics|de|Family members|Female}} ---- ==Hunsrik== ===Alternative forms=== * {{alter|hrx|muter||Portuguese-based orthography}} ===Etymology=== From {{inh|hrx|goh|muoter}}, from {{inh|hrx|gem-pro|*mōdēr}}, from {{inh|hrx|ine-pro|*méh₂tēr}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|hrx|/ˈmutɐ/}} ===Noun=== {{head|hrx|noun|g=f|plural|Mitter|diminutive|Mutterche}} # [[mother]] #: {{ux|hrx|Sie is mein '''Mutter'''.|She is my '''mother'''.}} ====Antonyms==== * {{l|hrx|Fatter}} ===External links=== * [http://www.hunsrik.org/Lexi/SearchResult?searchStr=Mutter Online Hunsrik Dictionary] {{topics|hrx|Family members|Female}}
